user_story: As a professor, I must be able to create problems so students can have problems to do.
As a student, I must be able to select and a view a problem so I can practise on it.
As a professor, I should be able to create an assignment consisting of problems that I created so students have a set of problems to do.
As a professor, I should be able to post an assignment for my students so they can complete it.
As a professor, I should be able to set a deadline for my assignments so students cannot submit afterwards.
As a professor, I should be able to assign a grade to a student's submission so the student knows how well he/she did.
As a student, I should be able to see my grade for a submission so I know how well I did.
As a professor, I should be able to add feedback to a student's assignment so the student knows where they can improve in.
As a professor, I should be able to edit the deadline and any details of an assignment so I don't need to re-create the assignment if I made a mistake.
As a professor, I should be able to set details when I create my assignments for both the students and for myself. Details can include: Name, Total Mark, and weight of assignment.
As a professor, I should be able to create a class for a set of students so students know which class they're in.
As a student, I should be able to see the details of an assignment so I have a better understanding of what is expected of me for the assignment.
As a student, I should be able to view all the problems so I can easily select the ones that are required.
As a student I should be able submit solutions to assignments so I can receive feedbacks from an instructor.
As a professor, it would be nice to be able to create a problem using LaTeX syntax so I can have my assignments styled better.
As a professor, it would be nice to set up template questions where the remaining information is auto-generated so that I can reuse them in multiple assignments
As a professor, it would be nice to be able to export assignment results into an Excel file so I can combine them with marks from term tests and exams.
As a student, it would be nice if I received a notification through email that a new assignment has been posted.
As a student, it would be nice if I could see the average and the median marks for each assignment.
As a student, it would be nice to export the results of an assignment to an Excel file so I can combine them with marks from term tests and exams
As a professor, it would be nice to allow students to have multiple chances for some assignments.
As a student, it would be nice if I could see a list of assignments I have not completed yet.
As a student, I should be able to view the answers to an assignment after the deadline.
As a professor, I should be able to add answers to an assignment and have it be visible to students after the deadline.
As a professor, it would be nice to have a page that explains the functionality of the application so students don't get lost navigating the page.
